channel.title: perfs on Math2001's blog
channel.description: Recent content in perfs on Math2001's blog

item.title: So vim got slow
item.description: You know that feeling? You press in a key, and you have to wait like 0.5 seconds to see it appear on screen. You try to run vim --clean and everything’s back to “normal”. As you expected, it is caused by a/some plugin(s) and/or you vimrc. Have fun debugging that. You probably know the bulk force: disable every plugin, and enable them once at a time to know which one’s slow.

item.title: How to combine svgs
item.description: If you want your website to be fast, you should limit the number of http requests. A great way of doing that is combining your images. If you use SVGS for your icons and stuff like that, here’s how you can combine all your icon in one big file, and use them in your website!
